alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Muscogee, southwestern Talbot and southern Harris Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Beulah to Box Springs, and moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Waverly Hall, Geneva, Ellerslie, Mountain Hill, Juniper, Cataula, Baughville, Mulberry Grove and Lake Harding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
